postOnShareGPT.warning: Please be aware that by posting your conversation on ShareGPT, it will become publicly accessible and viewable to anyone. Once posted, the conversation cannot be hidden or deleted, and may be archived or shared by others. We advise you to consider carefully and avoid sharing sensitive or private information on this platform.

informationAboutUs:
We, under the name [**Plan X**](https://www.facebook.com/planxdev/), are a group of developers and programmers with a mission to embrace the latest technologies, create, and provide cutting-edge experiences for users. Currently, the group consists of 01 member: [*Viet Nguyen Quoc*](https://www.facebook.com/nguyenviet3057/). We eagerly look forward to expanding the team in the long run.

The **GoGPT** project is built upon the original [*BetterGPT project by Jing Hua*](https://github.com/ztjhz/BetterChatGPT) (an extension UI of [*OpenAI's ChatGPT*](https://chat.openai.com/)), simplified and enhanced with the feature of generating images from text. The project encompasses two main functionalities: a Chatbot utilizing the OpenAI API with the GPT-3.5-turbo model, and an AI Art feature using the Stable Diffusion model (SDXL 1.0 base).
Anticipated upcoming features include: Generating music/sound from text; Creating scripts from text; and more.

We are eager to receive feedback and contributions from all of you!
